temples.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, the largest religious monument in the world, and they are known for their temples.

temples.description: An iconic symbol of love and a masterpiece of Mughal architecture.

temples.name: Amritsar, India
temples.description: India is known for its vibrant festivals like Holi, the birthplace of major religions like Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, and Sikhism, its practice of yoga and Ayurveda, and temples.
